name: The Gunslinger demo
description:
This is a demo I made for my game the gunslinger.

I manly made it for the demo day 31 game jam and just to have a demo.

It has 10 levels with one boss.

Has a version for windows, mac and linux

added html support so it would be easier to play

please give feedback on my game with itch.io comments since those are saved and I can read them at any time.

I hope you enjoy
